text: There were two governments called the Tagalog Republic (, which means "Republic of the Tagalog Nation/People"; ). Filipino people made these governments when the Philippines was a colony of Spain, and when it was a colony of the United States. They fought against the Spanish Empire and in the Philippineâ€“American War. Both governments were connected to the Katipunan movement, which wanted the Philippines to be a free country. title: Tagalog Republic
